title: Crowley and Aziraphale's Best Moments | Good Omens | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment: Got to love it when Prime agrees with the fandom about these ineffable husbands
They literally couldn’t have done a better job casting these two than they did with Michael Sheen and David Tennant.
Crowley's flirting is so obvious for someone's sake! And Aziraphale is so stupidly oblivious IT'S ADORABLE!

Intro: Crowley and Aziraphale’s love story best moments 
Description: “They’re on opposite ends of the morality spectrum, but you can’t beat chemistry”
They aren’t even trying at this point
The random gay guy off the street saying “I’ve been there, you’re better off without him” is so on the nose 👃
description:
They're on opposite ends of the morality spectrum, but you just can't beat chemistry.
